infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SnapSell needs access to your camera to take photos of items you want to sell.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SnapSell needs access to your photo library to select photos of items you want to sell.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SnapSell needs access to your location to automatically fill in your location for listings.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: SnapSell needs access to your location to automatically fill in your location for listings.

plugins.photosPermission: SnapSell needs access to your photo library to select photos of items you want to sell.
plugins.cameraPermission: SnapSell needs access to your camera to take photos of items you want to sell.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: SnapSell needs access to your location to automatically fill in your location for listings.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: SnapSell needs access to your location to automatically fill in your location for listings.
